descriptions:
['DescriptionThis fully upgraded 3 Bedroom apartment with maid's room offers unparalleled quality and breath taking views , over 
looking the sea you enjoy overlooking the Dubai Eye , Palm Jumeirah and Burj Alarab.  Custom Designed and professionally fit out with only the highest quality European brands and fully integrated smart home feature, this home is impressive and truly an exceptional apartment on the shores of the Dubai Marina.
Kitchen : 
Designed by " GOETTLING " top german kitchen designer . "Schuller Next 125 Range" kitchen manufactured in Germany. Appliances are from " Miele " including : Main Oven , Grill Oven , Steam Oven and two plate warmers also two integrated fridge and freezer and Almost "Brand new" .
Bathrooms, Bath Tubs and Washbasins :
" Laufen Alessi " Made by the luxury Swiss Bathrooms Manufacturer.
Bathrooms Accessories :
" Grohe and Hansgrohe "Electric Towel Heaters , Cabinets , Cosmetic Mirrors ..... From London Based " West one bathrooms LTD "
Wardrobes :
Designed and custom made by " Poliform " one of the world's leading Italian manufacturer of furniture.
Blinds :
Electrical blinds on All windows Supplied and fitted by " Hunter Douglas " the world’s leading Dutch manufacturer of window coverings. The blinds are operated by both the home automation via an iPad/ iPhone or room wall sockets  as well as " SOMFI"  hand held remote control.
Home automation:
Designed and installed by " Witty Technologies "
Marble Flooring :
" Armani Grey " Italian marble fitted throughout including the 4 balconies ( excluding the 5 bathrooms )
Wood Flooring :
" Oak Wood " flooring from Finland , supplied and fitted in all bedrooms.
Wall Sockets :
" Forbes & Lomax " All Electrical sockets are supplied by the UK London based company.
Ceiling Downlights :
" Orlight" Architectural Downlights manufactured and supplied by UK London Based firm.']
